sentences.english: Walking home by the alma mater is just for seeking fun.
sentences.chinese: 經過母校步行回家僅僅爲了取樂而已。

sentences.english: My high school is having its twentieth reunion next month.
sentences.chinese: 我的高中母校下個月舉辦二十週年同學會。

sentences.english: Yes, and she teaches in Peking University after graduation there.
sentences.chinese: 是的，她從北大畢業以後還在母校執教。

sentences.english: Events at Hart High School, Ervin's alma mater, received Olympic themes to celebrate his achievements.
sentences.chinese: 埃爾文的母校哈特高中在奧運主題裏祝賀他的成功。

sentences.english: Naomi paid a surprise visit to her old school in London.
sentences.chinese: 娜奧米實然訪問了她在倫敦的母校。

sentences.english: I believe that you are accustomed to a multi-ethnic environment in your alma mater.
sentences.chinese: 我相信您習慣在您的母校的一個不同種族的環境。

sentences.english: Recently, Lang Lang returned to Curtis Institute of Music to hold a master class.
sentences.chinese: 近日，郎朗應邀回費城母校Curtis舉辦大師課。

sentences.english: Actually that examination place is the mother's Alma mater, but also their hometown.
sentences.chinese: 其實那考試的地方是媽媽的母校，也是老家。

sentences.english: I never go past my old school but I think of Mr Wilkins, the headmaster.
sentences.chinese: 每當經過我的母校，我總是想起校長威爾金斯先生。

sentences.english: Xian spent his childhood in Singapore and studied in Yangzheng Primary.
sentences.chinese: 冼星海在新加坡度過童年，養正學校是他的母校。

sentences.english: We must try to win glory for the alma mater.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須爲母校贏得榮譽。

sentences.english: So please enjoy their poem with music called The poem for Our Alma Mater.
sentences.chinese: 請欣賞配樂詩朗誦《獻給母校的詩》。

sentences.english: In 2011 I ever leave my alma mater, Xinji middle school.
sentences.chinese: 私元兩整逐一年我永久分開了我的母校，辛集合教。

sentences.english: The couple originally met at their alma mater, Pomona College outside Los Angeles, California.
sentences.chinese: 兩人在位於加州洛杉磯外的母校波莫納學院相遇。

sentences.english: A 50-years-old American officer came back to his old school.
sentences.chinese: 一位50歲的美國軍官回到他的母校。

sentences.english: With the help of her alma mater, she made the new song Rare Isotope.
sentences.chinese: 她新近借母校之力，創作了新曲《稀有同位素》。

definition: anniversary of the founding of a school
the Great Learning, one of the Four Books 四書|四书[Si4 shu1] in Confucianism
attached (or affiliated) secondary (or middle) school/abbr. for 附屬中學|附属中学[fu4 shu3 zhong1 xue2]
abbr. for 師範大學|师范大学[shi1 fan4 da4 xue2], normal university/teacher training college
Jiaotong University/University of Communications/abbr. of 交通大學|交通大学[Jiao1 tong1 Da4 xue2]
abbr. for 清華大學|清华大学[Qing1 hua2 Da4 xue2]
Peking University (abbr. for 北京大學|北京大学)
